/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the urban buildings that flank it. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
